name: Mornings
description:
I was inspired by the culture of Zine ( small-circulation, self-published magazines ). I thought I'd make my own and make it interactive.


This is an interactive zine about mornings. Specifically about my habit of pressing the snooze button when the alarm goes off. I hope I'm not the only one going through this.


I hope you enjoy it! Please feel free to share it with other who share the same feelings. If you'd like to see a physical version of it, please let me know and I'll make it printable!
Any feedback is welcome!
